evaluations.question: Which scholars won Physics in 1921?
evaluations.model_answer: Albert Einstein won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1921
RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year ORDER BY p.awardYear

evaluations.question: Which prizes were awarded in 1922?
evaluations.model_answer: In 1922, the Nobel Prizes were awarded in the following categories: Medicine, Chemistry, and Physics.
evaluations.generated_cypher: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.category AS prize_category, p.awardYear AS award_year

evaluations.question: Which scholars affiliated with an institution in Germany died between the years 1935 and 1945?
evaluations.model_answer:
The scholars affiliated with an institution in Germany who died between the years 1935 and 1945 are:

- Richard Willstätter (Kaiser-Wilhelm-Institut (now Max-Planck Institut) für Chemie, Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität; died 1942)
- Walther Nernst (Berlin University; died 1941)
- Hans Spemann (University of Freiburg im Breisgau; died 1941)
- Carl Bosch (I.G. Farbenindustrie A.G., University of Heidelberg; died 1940)
- Hans Fischer (Technische Hochschule (Institute of Technology); died 1945)
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'germany' AND s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01' AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS ScholarName, i.name AS InstitutionName, s.deathDate AS DeathDate

evaluations.question: Which scholars won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1933?
evaluations.model_answer: Paul Dirac and Erwin Schrödinger won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1933.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1933
RETURN s.knownName AS winner, p.category AS category, p.awardYear AS award_year

evaluations.question: Who are the female laureates in Physics?
evaluations.model_answer:
The female laureates in Physics are:
- Donna Strickland (2018)
- Maria Goeppert Mayer (1963)
- Andrea Ghez (2020)
- Marie Curie (1903)
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(s.gender) = 'female' AND toLower(p.category) = 'physics'
RETURN s.knownName AS laureate, p.category AS category, p.awardYear AS award_year

evaluations.question: Which scholars born in France won a Nobel Prize in Chemistry?
evaluations.model_answer:
The scholars born in France who won a Nobel Prize in Chemistry are:

- Henri Moissan (Awarded in 1906)
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS 'chemistry'
MATCH (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'france'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName, p.awardYear, co.name AS BirthCountry

evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS 'physics'
MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'denmark'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName, p.awardYear, i.name as Institution

evaluations.question: Which scholars affiliated with Stanford University won a prize in 1996?
evaluations.model_answer: Douglas D. Osheroff, affiliated with Stanford University, won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1996.
evaluations.generated_cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1996 MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'stanford' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName, p.category, i.name AS Institution

evaluations.question: Which scholars won the Nobel Prize in Economics in 2019?

evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'economics' AND p.awardYear = 2019
RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.category AS category, p.awardYear AS award_year
ORDER BY p.awardYear

evaluations.generated_cypher:
